title:
Quartic surfaces with an outer Galois point and K3 surfaces with an
  automorphism of order 4
abstract:
We prove that there exists a one-to-one correspondence between smooth quartic
surfaces with an outer Galois point and K3 surfaces with a certain automorphism
of order 4. Furthermore, we characterize quartic surfaces with two or more
outer Galois points as K3 surfaces.
